description.value: With your large size, you need to be careful around your smaller friends. You have learned to move in such a way that it gives others the chance to make room for you. Stride up to your Speed. If you end your movement in a position where one or more of your spaces are occupied by an ally, each of those allies can immediately Step as a free action so that they are no longer occupying the same space as you. If this isn't possible, you must end your movement so that you aren't sharing a space with an ally, as normal.
